content:
This trimester program https://www.mathematics.uni-bonn.de/him/programs/current-trimester-program/him-trimester-program-prospects-of-formal-mathematics is going really well. We're in the Workshop: Bridging between informal and formal math.

We just had (over the weekend) the workshop "Women in formal Math" https://www.mathematics.uni-bonn.de/him/programs/special-events/women-in-formal-math. Check out the videos!
WiFM1.jpg
Is it possible to link directly to the videos? Or are they going to slowly land on YouTube like how the trimester program has been doing so far?
Great to hear of the workshop "Women in formal Math". It really was striking to me how relatively few women participated at CT 2024.
@David Michael Roberts I really don't know. I expect them to trickle down to youtube like the other HIM ones. and some might be missing altogether, as the recording equipment was playing up.
Thanks @Todd Trimble ! It's a concern of mine, as you know.
